name: Think Kids: Ist doch Logisch!
description:
www.engine-software.com - official developer's website (from Ad Blurbs)

Think Kids 2 is a fun and challenging educative title aimed to challenge children and improve many cognative abilities through playing. Whether it's memory, language skills, pattern recognition, logical thinking: Think Kids has something to learn for everyone. With 18 different games in three difficulty settings, it's a complete package! Winner of the German GIGA Maus award for Best Educational Title of the Year 2009.
publishedBy: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG

releases.publisher: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG
